mapper.sql: BID, CODE, CCODE, CUST, TDATE, EDATE, TVOL, PRICE, APRICE, TAXRATE, TAXKUBU, SOUSUUOUT, SOUOUTKINGAKU, FDATE, HOKAN, NOTE, SYSNOTE, INPUTDATE, INPUTUSER
mapper.select: SELECT FROM BASIC_XBAIK WHERE BID = #{bid} and
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BASIC_XBAIK(BID, CODE, CCODE, CUST, TDATE, EDATE, TVOL, PRICE, APRICE, TAXRATE, TAXKUBU, SOUSUUOUT, SOUOUTKINGAKU, FDATE, HOKAN, NOTE, SYSNOTE, INPUTDATE, INPUTUSER) VALUES
( #{item.bid}, #{item.code}, #{item.ccode}, #{item.cust}, #{item.tdate}, #{item.edate}, #{item.tvol}, #{item.price}, #{item.aprice}, #{item.taxrate}, #{item.taxkubu}, #{item.sousuuout}, #{item.sououtkingaku}, #{item.fdate}, #{item.hokan}, #{item.note}, #{item.sysnote}, #{item.inputdate}, #{item.inputuser}, )
mapper.update: update BASIC_XBAIK set BID = #{bid}, CODE = #{code}, CCODE = #{ccode}, CUST = #{cust}, TDATE = #{tdate}, EDATE = #{edate}, TVOL = #{tvol}, PRICE = #{price}, APRICE = #{aprice}, TAXRATE = #{taxrate}, TAXKUBU = #{taxkubu}, SOUSUUOUT = #{sousuuout}, SOUOUTKINGAKU = #{sououtkingaku}, FDATE = #{fdate}, HOKAN = #{hokan}, NOTE = #{note}, SYSNOTE = #{sysnote}, INPUTDATE = #{inputdate}, INPUTUSER = #{inputuser}, WHERE BID = #{bid} and
mapper.delete: delete from BASIC_XBAIK WHERE BID = #{item.bid} and

delete.foreach: delete from BASIC_XBAIK WHERE BID = #{item.bid} and
